it.polimi.se2018.networking.server

Class DelegateNetInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.networking.server.DelegateNetInterface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServerNetInterface

    public class DelegateNetInterface
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServerNetInterface
    This class is used by sub-servers to delegate the master server.
    Author:
    dvdmff
